title: Redeeming the Free Codes
body: So I've tried to get most of the free codes like the Tristiana and Alistar skins and champions. But whenever I try to redeem them I just get "There was a problem fulfilling your store items, please try again." I've uninstalled LoL and downloaded it again, still wont work. My emails verified and everything, just seems like too much hassle to go through getting everything for a ticket, anyone else getting the same issue of know how to fix it?

replies.body: Sometimes those codes just refuse to work correctly. No worries fam, da poros got you! Be sure you refresh your client if you aren't seeing it!
